description: Working examples of Elemental 3 configuration files. Use these as templates.

files.release.yaml:
name: "Unified Core"
manifestURI: "oci://registry.suse.de/devel/unifiedcore/releases/0.6/product/manifest:latest"
components:
  systemd:
    - extension: "clp"
  helm:
    - chart: "rancher"
      valuesFile: "rancher.yaml"
files.kubernetes.yaml:
helm:
  charts:
    - name: "rancher"
      repositoryName: "rancher-latest"
      version: "2.9.0"
      targetNamespace: "cattle-system"
      valuesFile: "rancher.yaml"
  repositories:
    - name: "rancher-latest"
      url: "https://releases.rancher.com/server-charts/latest"

manifests:
  - "https://github.com/rancher/rke2/releases/download/v1.28.10%2Brke2r1/rke2.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

network:
  apiHost: "rancher.example.com"
  apiVIP: "192.168.122.100"
files.butane.yaml:
variant: fcos
version: 1.6.0
passwd:
  users:
    - name: user
      password_hash: "$y$j9T$ExampleHash..."
      ssh_authorized_keys:
        - "ssh-rsa AAAAB3Nza..."
